column1: #Text=Wikinews interviews Goronwy Price about the upcoming by-election in the Bradfield electorate of the Australian parliament
#Text=With two federal by-elections coming up in Australia , many minor parties and independents will be looking to gain a seat in the House of Representatives .
#Text=Goronwy Price is a candidate representing the Environmentalists for Nuclear Energy party .
#Text=Mr Price is an environmentalist , adventurer and businessman from the Sydney suburb of Cremorne .
#Text=" In 1975 I founded the adventure travel company World Expeditions and built it to be the world 's largest adventure organisation .
